dict.string: mobility of points on the surface
effective viscosity (if unspecified, simul:viscosity is used). Set the effective viscosity to lower or increase the drag coefficient of a particular class of Sphere.

if true, use special formula to calculate mobilities
This formula is derived from Lubrication theory and applies in the case where the sphere fits tightly in an elongated volume.
flag to include steric interaction for this object
distance added to the radius to set the steric interaction distance
name of space used for confinement (also known as confine[2])
